results.content: I just completed a full-stack bootcamp and this was a great review of everything I covered. In his videos, Ryan explains every line of code  and I have a much greater understand of CRUD and react. I was building a student database CRUD app but was able to use all the lesson I learned here. I will be taking ALL of Ryan's classes. What a great teacher.
results.content_html: I just completed a full-stack bootcamp and this was a great review of everything I covered. In his videos, Ryan explains every line of code and I have a much greater understand of CRUD and react. I was building a student database CRUD app but was able to use all the lesson I learned here. I will be taking ALL of Ryan's classes. What a great teacher.

results.content: I took this course to refresh myself on the MERN stack. The teacher definitely knows his stuff. It was a little fast for me, though. Some of the backend coding was confusing so I'll have to go back and review a couple of sections. Overall, this was a no nonsense course that has helped me get something new deployed. I'm happy with that.

results.content:
Enjoyed the course and got a lot from it. Really solidifies the basics of the MERN stack for me on which I can now build.

Just one suggestion - the folder download numbers and the video lesson numbers could be more synchronized. 

Apart from that keep up the good work Ryan.
